items.summary: Celebrating six years of innovation! Our SPIKE Prime kits now embrace 3D printing and laser cutting, proving robotics lessons extend beyond the box. Let imagination lead! #RoboCamp
Transport young minds to a galaxy far away with Cosmic Battle! Students aged 6â€“9 build and code starfighters using SPIKE Essential, teaching unpredictability and fun coding basics.
3D Printing: A boon or bane for SPIKE Prime classes? Dive into RoboCamp's lesson plans with the freedom of custom designs or face the challenge of logistics. Share your thoughts!
Transform nostalgia with SPIKE Prime and Python, letting students build and program classic games like Snake and Arkanoid. A journey from gaming to coding awaits in our expert course.
Build a mechanical owl using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 alongside laser-cut pieces. The Flying Bird project teaches design principles and mechanics through a hands-on approach.
Visualize centrifugal force with the Carousel model. Built using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 and laser-cut elements, this project offers hands-on physics learning and analytical skill development.
Exciting projects await with 8 new robot lesson plans! Enhance student learning with cranes, carousels, and flying birds using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and a laser cutter.
Engage students with the Flying Bird project! Utilize SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 sets and a laser cutter to build a crank-powered owl model, teaching mechanical principles effectively.
Spice up lessons with 8 robotic projects, including cranes and flying birds! Designed for SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and laser cutters, these projects promise educational fun for students.
Revive classic games like Snake and Arkanoid with SPIKE Prime and Python. Kids build and code, learning game mechanics and programming in an engaging way. Spark their curiosity!
Dive into a Cosmic Battle and bring space adventures into your classroom! Use SPIKE Essential to build starfighters, encouraging playful coding and the thrill of the unknown.
Explore physics with Carousel! Create a physical model using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2, demonstrating centrifugal force dynamically. A perfect blend of science experience and skill development.
Build a functional anemometer with SPIKE Prime and 3D printing! This lesson combines STEM, engineering, and real-world data collection with tools like Tinkercad and a 3D printer.
